definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Or if we drew a phase diagram, here's the line.
sentences.chinese: 或者畫一個相圖，然後說這條線在這。

sentences.english: Quantity of water solubilization by rust inhibitors was calculated based on the phase digram .
sentences.chinese: 在相圖測定的基礎上，計算出防鏽劑對水的增溶度。

sentences.english: The flowchart and the calculating results of seve…
sentences.chinese: 文中列有計算框圖及對數種相圖的計算結果。

sentences.english: The phase diagram of a homogenous ultracold Fermi gas with spin polarization is studied at unitarity.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超冷均勻極化的費米氣體在共振區的相圖。

sentences.english: All gas region of the phase diagram.
sentences.chinese: 相圖中完全是液相的區域。

sentences.english: Their characteristics have been simply analysed and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 給出了幾種典型的動態相圖，簡要討論了其特點。

sentences.english: Why shouldn't we be able to calculate phase diagrams?
This paper provide another method to phase diagram of trona carbonation and phase diagram analysis.
sentences.chinese: 給出了又一種天然鹼碳酸化相圖及相圖分析。

sentences.english: This paper provide another method to phase diagram of trona carbonation and phase diagram analysis.
sentences.chinese: 給出了又一種天然鹼碳酸化相圖及相圖分析。

sentences.english: So now I can draw a similar diagram for sugared water.
sentences.chinese: 現在我可以對糖水畫出相同的相圖。

sentences.english: There is only scale-free regime in the phase diagram.
sentences.chinese: 在網絡的相圖中只有無標度區。

sentences.english: The paper discusses the law of the damping-without-drive simple pendulum motion through phase-graph method.
sentences.chinese: 用相圖法分析討論了有阻尼無驅動單擺的運動規律。

sentences.english: Recent developments concerning the electronic phase diagram of high temperature superconductors(HTS) are presented.
sentences.chinese: 要介紹了高溫超導體的電子態相圖及最近的一些發展。

sentences.english: The isothermal section of this system at 900 ℃ were constructed.
sentences.chinese: 並構作了這個體系900℃等溫截面的相圖。

sentences.english: The tricritical point in the temperature-polarization plane is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 在溫度和費米子極化的相圖上得到了三相點的位置。

sentences.english: What you saw before, we just drew phase diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 像以前一樣，我們先來畫相圖。
